title: basic dice roller
comment: The buttens are customizable. no advertisements. perfect.

Simple and efficient. Will track on a star if I can customize the default roll offerings.  Thank you for the freebie!   Edit: thanks for responding and letting me know I could long-press the default buttons to change their value. This is a sound and whole app.
Long-press the buttons to change their value. Have fun!

title: Simple text ui, good customization
comment: This app combines a very simple text ui with a fairly robust die configuration that should be suitable for almost any tabletop game. All that bundled up in a package that has no ads or permission requests.

title: Excellent tool
comment: Easy to use. Good for serious game masters. Does not have roll effect so not good for graphics-oriented gamers. My favourite after trying out a dozen other dice apps.

title: refreshing!
comment: Finally, a simple and powerful dice app without sound and 3D effects. Thanks so much!

title: Extremely customizable
comment: You're able to choose what dice from a wide variety basically anything you need and you get to add modifiers to keep track of so if you have one attack you do all the time you have an easy time of rolling with the tax

title: Many limits
comment: Doesn't let you roll the infamous d8+d12 used on many AD&D encounter tables. Won't let you run Star Wars:Edge of the Empire nor the current Marvel, as those dice pool systems use multiple types per roll, such as d6+d8+d8+d10. Doesn't allow for unusual dice types (d5, d7, d16, d30) nor the really rare d14 and d24. It's simple, and it's good for systems with only a few roll types; I'd hate to use it for WEG's d6 system or for Burning Wheel.

title: Simple, fast and effective!
comment: I wish it handle pool of dices and have some animations, but its simplicity is really nice.

title: All I needed
comment: When I realized that I left my RPG dices back in my home country I had a problem: no RPG in the upcoming week. This app saved me! Thanks!

title: Almost there...
comment: Would like to see another row of dice presets at the bottom of the screen.

title: Great app
comment: Does exactly what I need and what it says it will do, without ads or data gathering. Thank you!

title: Lacking diversity
comment: For an app to replace the real thing, it requires the diversity of that thing; in this case, dice. You can't set faces other than the basic 7, you can't program special rolls like exploding dice in a pool or target scores, to name just a couple shortcomings. It's a fine app for simple rolls, but to live up to it's name will require much more work.

title: Good dice roller!
comment: Simple and usable interface. This dice roller has everything that I need and only what I need. Desire S
Works great, haven't had any problems. desire HD
